Name: Cindy Lou

Summary: Cindy Lou Who is pursuing a B.S. in Computer Science with minors in Mathematics and Physics at Nova Southeastern University, expected to graduate in May 2010, holding a 3.75 GPA and Dean's List honors. Her coursework includes Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Computer Graphics, and Human-Computer Interaction. Professional experience includes developing wikis, blogs, and social networks as an Intern at ABC Research, maintaining university websites as a Student Web Developer at NSU Library Application Services, and serving as a Teaching Assistant for programming and physics courses. She also taught basic computer skills at the YMCA and tutors math/science for elementary students.
